sourcesContent:
import { Button, Modal, Form, Alert } from "react-bootstrap";
import { useForm } from "react-hook-form";

export default function ChangePasswordModal({ isOpen, close }) {
    const { register, handleSubmit} = useForm();

   const onSubmit = (formData) =>{
        alert("contraseña cambiada")
    }

    

  return (
    <Modal show={isOpen} onHide={close}>
        <Modal.Header closeButton>
            <Modal.Title> Cambiar Contraseña </Modal.Title>
        </Modal.Header>
        
        <Modal.Body>

            <Form onSubmit={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>
                <Form.Group>
                    <Form.Label>Nueva Comtraseña</Form.Label>

                    <Form.Control
                        placeholder="Escribe una nueva contraseña"
                        {...register('password')}
                    />

                    <Form.Text>
                        <Alert variant='denger'>
                            error en el campo contraseña
                        </Alert>
                    </Form.Text>
                </Form.Group>
            </Form>

        </Modal.Body>

        <Modal.Footer>

            <Button variant='secondary' onClick={close}>Cancelar</Button>
            <Button variant='primary' onClick={handleSubmit(onSubmit)}>Actualizar Contraseña</Button>

        </Modal.Footer>
    </Modal>
  )
}
